personal.title: Data Scientist & Analytics Expert | MBA | 7+ Years Experience
personal.summary: Bridging advanced technical engineering and strategic business decision-making

about.description: Senior Data Scientist & Analytics Advisor with 7+ years of experience and an MBA in Business Analytics. I specialize in bridging advanced technical engineering and strategic business decision-making, currently leading Machine Learning (NLP) solutions and modernizing legacy data architectures using Microsoft Fabric at ICBC.

experience.title: Analytics Advisor
experience.description: Leading machine learning (NLP) solutions for customer sentiment analysis. Building interactive Tableau dashboards and automating reporting processes. Driving data modernization initiatives by migrating legacy systems to Oracle Database and Microsoft Fabric.

experience.title: Analyst
experience.description: Built complete data science pipelines including SQL querying, data cleaning, and machine learning algorithms in Python. Developed revenue prediction models from product advertisements and performed sentiment analysis on customer feedback. Created impactful Tableau visualizations transforming raw data into actionable business insights.

experience.title: Data Analyst Intern
experience.description: Developed predictive models in Python to forecast food demand and minimize kitchen waste. Created Tableau dashboards highlighting food waste patterns. Set up Google Tag Manager events and analyzed KPIs in Google Analytics.

projects.title: Food Waste Prediction & Analytics
projects.description: Predictive analytics solution for Rethink2gether to forecast food demand and minimize kitchen waste. Combined machine learning forecasting with comprehensive Tableau dashboards and web analytics integration.

projects.title: Revenue & Sentiment Analysis Pipeline
projects.description: Comprehensive data science pipeline for predicting revenue from product advertisements and analyzing customer sentiment. Processes large-scale datasets using Python and SQL for strategic decision-making.

projects.title: Customer Sentiment Analysis (NLP)
projects.description: Natural Language Processing solution analyzing open-ended customer feedback to extract sentiment and actionable insights. Integrates Python NLP libraries with enterprise data pipelines for continuous analysis.

projects.title: Data Modernization & Migration
projects.description: Led initiative migrating legacy data infrastructure to modern cloud platforms. Engineered data pipelines using Oracle Database, SQL, and Microsoft Fabric. Improved data accessibility and analytics capabilities organization-wide.
